sentence: We felt in love with the place and the staff
The Best Service Food and Dive Shop
He also told us about the upcoming renovations and was very proud of his staff and the hotel

It was probably the worst Hilton experience ever mind you the setting is lovely great beach area convenient to Wilemsted and a few of the hotel staff were helpful and gracious shout out to Fiona at the front desk
Nice grounds building needs a face lift carpets are washed out staff extremely helpful bed are comfortable
Another great week at the Hilton Curacao thanks to excellent staff
The staff is very friendly and accommodating to your needs
Clean and friendly personnel op
I work in the hotel industry and I would kill to have staff as outgoing accommodating and pleasant as the staff here
No matter how much you plan out your fantastic and beautiful vacation much of that experience relies on your hotel accommodations and service during your visit
The front desk staff are very friendly but can not say the same of the beach front bar restaurant they seemed very indifferent
I had to talk to the frontdesk AND to the manager Mr Santiago to get it work
The next day I confirmed TWICE with the front desk person Manuel
I had to talk to the front desk AND to the manager Mr Santiago to get it work
Overall not a bad place to stay the friendly service was never lacking
A poorly trained arrogant staff can ruin a stay vacation
No To qualify my expectations I would rather have an accommodating staff than a new hotel
The worst was the delay in the delivery of the meals in de Bliss bar and Cielo restaurant
Expensive bad quality and poor service

Our room was on 1st floor it was a view of playground and the kitchen staff moving carts and a small view of the sea Everything in the room was old ugly crack floors dirty carpet the room needs total remake
Staff made every effort to make you happy even though they were linited in what they could do about the overall property condition
So to make it very clear Desire is a shining star and would still be if she were amongst a crew of very capable people
We never had any resort guest services around the pool or in the beach area
We also went to C Spice for Diner a bit more upscale good food service was a bit slow but staff was very friendly

One small unpleasant moment our pool chairs were given away by pool staff was quickly fixed and made right by providing an umbrella where we had to relocate and apologies too so it was impossible to be mad
